episodes.title: Inside The Rod Ferrell VAMPIRE CULT | Handsome Devils
episodes.description:
Rod Ferrell’s vampire cult lured teens into a world of blood rituals, manipulation, and murder. From Murray, Kentucky to a Florida crime scene, this episode of Handsome Devils exposes how obsession, occultism, and charisma turned deadly. 

Handsome Devils S01 E05
0:00 — A Charismatic Teen Turns Deadly
4:43 — Rod Ferrell's Vampire Cult Emerges
8:05 — Blood Ritual Initiation with Heather
11:42 — Jaden Murphy the Vampire Rival
15:22 — Cult Chaos in Murray Kentucky Occult
17:59 — Charity Keesee Joins the Vampire Cult
23:40 — The Heather Wendorf Case Begins
28:17 — Occult Ritual Murder Unfolds
35:40 — Teen Vampires Lose Their Faith
45:12 — Facing Justice in a True Crime Story

Check out our latest twisted true crime story—your next obsession starts here! 🔪

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ju8kG40YB2I
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ei7tMxTc_OA

Handsome Devils reveals the dark side of charm, profiling men who use their good looks and wit to disguise their deadly intentions. Each episode uncovers the shocking stories of seemingly perfect partners who turned into manipulative, dangerous killers, featuring firsthand accounts from victims' families and insights from law enforcement and experts.
